originalAuthor.name: John Meredith
originalAuthor.organisation: Digital Health and Care Wales (DHCW) / openEHR International

en.purpose: To record calculations for use in a child growth chart. The data points align to the Royal College of Paediatrics and Child Health API.
keywords: RCPCH, growth, centile, chart, Turner, Trisomy-21
en.use: For use in capturing output from the RCPCH Growth Chart calculation API. Will take into account Height calculations aligned to UK-WHO, Turner Syndrome and Trisomy-21.

at0000.1.1.description: *Document to communicate information to others about the result of a test or assessment.(en)
*Document to communicate information to others about the result of a test or assessment.(en)
Document to communicate information to others about the result of a test or assessment.
*Document to communicate information to others about the result of a test or assessment.(en)

at0006.description: *Additional information required to capture local context or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
at0006.comment: * e.g. Local hospital departmental infomation or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.(en)

at0000.description: Dokument som brukes for å kommunisere informasjon til andre, ofte som svar på en forespørsel.

at0000.1.1.description: Dokument for å formidle informasjon til andre om svaret på en prøve eller undersøkelse.

at0006.description: Ytterligere informasjon som trengs for å kunne registrere lokalt definert innhold eller for å tilpasse til andre referansemodeller/formalismer.
at0006.comment: For eksempel lokale informasjonsbehov eller ytterligere metadata for å kunne tilpasse til tilsvarende konsepter i FHIR eller CIMI.

at0000.description: Documento para comunicar informações a outros, comumente em resposta a uma solicitação de terceiros.

at0002.description: Informação de identificação sobre o relatório.

at0005.description: O estado de todo o relatório. Nota: este não é o estado de qualquer dos componentes do relatório.

at0000.1.1.description: Documento para comunicar informações sobre o resultado de um teste ou avaliação.

at0006.description: Informação adicional requerida para capturar o contexto local ou para alinhar a outros modelos de referência/formalismos.
at0006.comment: Por exemplo: requisitos de informações locais ou metadados para alinhar com equivalentes do FHIR or CIMI.

at0000.description: Ein Dokument zur Übermittlung von Informationen an andere, meist als Antwort auf eine Anfrage.

at0005.description: Der Status des gesamten Berichts. Hinweis: Dies ist nicht der Status einer Berichtskomponente.

at0000.1.1.description: Das Dokument wird verwendet, um Informationen über das Ergebnis eines Tests oder einer Bewertung zu übermitteln.
테스트나 평가의 결과에 대해 다른 사람들과 정보를 통신하는 문서.

at0000.description: Asiakirja tiedon välittämiseksi muille, vastauksena yleensä toisen osapuolen pyyntöön.

at0005.description: Koko raportin tila. Huomaa: Tämä ei ole minkään raporttiosien tila.

at0006.description: Tarvitaan lisätietoja paikallisen tilanteen mallintamiseksi tai yhdenmukaistamiseksi muiden vertailumallien / muodollisuuksien kanssa.
at0006.comment: Esimerkiksi: paikalliset tietovaatimukset tai ylimääräiset metatiedot FHIR- tai CIMI-vastaavien mukaisiksi.

at0000.1.1.description: Asiakirja tiedon välittämiseksi muille, vastauksena yleensä toisen osapuolen pyyntöön.

at0000.1.description: Asiakirja tiedon välittämiseksi muille, vastauksena yleensä toisen osapuolen pyyntöön.

at0000.description: Documento per comunicare informazioni ad altri, comunemente in risposta ad una richiesta di un altro soggetto.

at0005.description: Lo stato dell'intero rapporto. Nota: Questo non è lo stato di alcuna delle componenti del rapporto.

at0006.description: Informazioni aggiuntive necessarie per catturare il contesto locale o per allinearsi con altri modelli/formalismi di riferimento.
at0006.comment: Per esempio: requisiti informativi locali o metadati aggiuntivi per allinearsi con gli equivalenti FHIR o CIMI.

at0000.1.1.description: Documento per comunicare informazioni ad altri, comunemente in risposta ad una richiesta di un altro soggetto.

at0000.1.description: Documento per comunicare informazioni ad altri, comunemente in risposta ad una richiesta di un altro soggetto.

at0000.description: Document om informatie met anderen te communiceren, vaak op verzoek van een andere partij.

at0005.description: De status van de rapportage. Let op, dit is niet de status van een van de onderdelen van de rapportage.

at0006.description: Extra informatie nodig om de context te beschrijven of te voldoen aan andere modellen of formalismen.
at0006.comment: Bijvoorbeeld: lokale informatievereisten of aanvullende metadata om overeen te komen met FHIR- of CIMI-equivalenten.

at0000.1.1.description: Document om informatie met anderen te communiceren, vaak op verzoek van een andere partij.

at0000.1.description: Document om informatie met anderen te communiceren, vaak op verzoek van een andere partij.

at0000.description: Dokument för att förmedla information till andra, vanligen som svar på en begäran från en annan part.

at0005.description: Status för hela rapporten. Observera att detta inte är status för någon av rapportkomponenterna.

at0006.description: Plats för tilläggsinformation som krävs för lokala anpassningar eller anpassning till andra referensmodeller eller formella krav.
at0006.comment: Exempelvis lokala informationskrav eller metadata för anpassning till FHIR- eller CIMI-motsvarigheter.

at0000.1.1.description: Dokument för att förmedla information till andra, vanligen som svar på en begäran från en annan part.

at0000.1.description: Dokument för att förmedla information till andra, vanligen som svar på en begäran från en annan part.

at0000.description: 用于交流信息的文件，通常是为了响应某一方的请求

at0002.description: 关于这份报告的标识信息。

at0005.description: 整份报告的状态。注意：这不是指报告的任何一个组成部分的状态

at0006.description: 用于捕获本地的上下文或与其他参考模型/形式保持一致所需的其他信息。
at0006.comment: 比如：本地的信息需求或是为了与FHIR或CIMI保持一致的其他元数据。

at0000.1.1.description: 用于交流信息的文件，通常是为了响应某一方的请求

at0000.1.description: 用于交流信息的文件，通常是为了响应某一方的请求

de.purpose: Eine generische Abschnittsüberschrift eines Templates, welche entsprechend dem spezifischen klinischen Kontext umbenannt werden sollte.
de.use: Dieser Archetyp kann für die Erstellung einer Abschnittsüberschrift in einem Template verwendet werden. Die Überschrift kann, passend zu dem jeweiligen klinischen Kontext, umbenannt werden. Zum Beispiel: "Ad hoc Überschrift" wird umbenannt in "Untersuchungsergebnisse".
de.misuse: Die Überschrift sollte in einem Template nicht unverändert verwendet werden.

ru.purpose: Базовый заголовок раздела, должен быть переименован в локальном шаблоне
ru.use: используется для создания и именования разделов в локальных шаблонах
ru.misuse: *Not to be left unchanged in a template.(en)

sv.purpose: En allmän avsnittsrubrik som döps om i en openEHR-mall för att passa in i en specifik klinisk kontext.
sv.use: Används för att skapa en avsnittsrubrik i en openEHR-mall som sedan döps om för att passa in i den specifika kliniska kontexten. Exempelvis "Rubrik" döps om till "Undersökningsfynd".
sv.misuse: Ska inte lämnas oförändrad i en openEHR-mall.

es-ar.purpose: Proporcionar un encabezado de sección de tipo genérico que será renombrado en una plantilla para su empleo en un contexto clínico específico.
es-ar.use: Utilizar para construir un encabezado de sección en una plantilla y que será renombrado para su empleo en un contexto clínico específico. Por ejemplo, "Encabezado ad hoc" puede renombrarse como "Hallazgos de examen".
es-ar.misuse: No debe mantenerse sin cambios en una plantilla.

nb.purpose: Brukes som en generisk seksjonsoverskrift som skal gis nytt navn i en templat for å passe i en gitt klinisk kontekst.
nb.use: Brukes til å lage en seksjonsoverskrift i en templat, hvis navn deretter endres for å passe i den aktuelle kliniske konteksten. For eksempel: "Templat-overskrift" endret til "Funn ved undersøkelse", "Anamnese", "Personopplysninger" eller "Oppsummering".
nb.misuse: Skal ikke stå med uendret navn i en templat.

pt-br.purpose: Oferecer um cabeçalho de uma sessão genérica que será renomeado no template para adequar-se a um contexto clínico específico.
pt-br.use: Utilize para construir um cabeçalho de uma sessão (de um template) que será renomeada para adequar-se a um contexto clínico específico. Por exemplo: "cabeçalho Ad hoc" renomeado para "Achados de exame".
pt-br.misuse: Não deve manter a configuração original no template.

sl.purpose: *To provide a generic section header which will be renamed in a template to suit a specific clinical context.(en)
sl.use: *Use to construct a section heading in a template that will be renamed to suit the specific clinical context. For example: "Ad hoc heading" renamed to "Examination findings".(en)
sl.misuse: *Not to be left unchanged in a template.(en)

en.purpose: To provide a generic section header which will be renamed in a template to suit a specific clinical context.
en.use: Use to construct a section heading in a template that will be renamed to suit the specific clinical context. For example: "Ad hoc heading" renamed to "Examination findings".
en.misuse: Not to be left unchanged in a template.

it.purpose: Fornire un'intestazione generica della sezione che sarà rinominata in un template per adattarsi ad uno specifico contesto clinico.
it.use: Usato per costruire un'intestazione di sezione in un template che sarà rinominato in base al contesto clinico specifico. Per esempio: "Intestazione ad hoc" rinominata in "Risultati dell'esame".
it.misuse: Non deve essere lasciato invariato in un template.

fr.purpose: *To provide a generic section header which will be renamed in a template to suit a specific clinical context.(en)
fr.use: *Use to construct a section heading in a template that will be renamed to suit the specific clinical context. For example: "Ad hoc heading" renamed to "Examination findings".(en)
fr.misuse: *Not to be left unchanged in a template.(en)

at0000.1.description: A generic section header which should be renamed in a template to suit a specific clinical context.

author.name: Vladimir Pizzo
author.organisation: Hospital Sírio Libanês, São Paulo, Brazil

en.purpose: To record an overview or summary record of the pregnancy and birth of an individual.
en.use: Use to record an overview or summary record of the pregnancy and birth of an individual.
en.misuse: Not to be used to record information about a pregnancy and birth for use in a maternal health record - use EVALUATION.pregnancy_summary and related archetypes for this purpose.

at0004.1.description: The date/time of birth of the individual.
at0004.1.comment: May also be used to record the assumed or agreed date/time of birth for operational purposes, if the actual date/time is not formally recorded. Possible alternatives for the date/time of birth of the individual can be recorded using the CLUSTER.DOB_alternative archetype 'Date of birth details' SLOT. Partial dates are allowed.

de.use: Dieser Archetyp kann für die Erstellung einer Abschnittsüberschrift in einem Template verwendet werden. Die Überschrift kann, passend zu dem jeweiligen klinischen Kontext, umbenannt werden. Zum Beispiel: "Ad hoc Überschrift" wird umbenannt in "Untersuchungsergebnisse".
de.misuse: Die Überschrift sollte in einem Template nicht unverändert verwendet werden.

at0000.1.description: A generic section header which should be renamed in a template to suit a specific clinical context.
Образец заголовка раздела
Un encabezado de sección de tipo genérico que será renombrado en una plantilla para su empleo en un contexto clínico específico.
Naslov sekcije
En generisk seksjonsoverskrift som skal gis nytt navn i en templat for å passe i en gitt klinisk kontekst.
Um cabeçalho de sessão genérico que deve ser renomeado no template para adequar-se a um contexto clínico específico.
En allmän avsnittsrubrik som döps om i en openEHR-mall för att passa in i en specifik klinisk kontext.
Eine generische Abschnittsüberschrift eines Templates, welche entsprechend dem spezifischen klinischen Kontext umbenannt werden sollte.
Un'intestazione di sezione generica che dovrebbe essere rinominata in un template per adattarsi ad uno specifico contesto clinico.
Un en-tête de section générique qui doit être renommé dans un modèle pour s'adapter à un contexte clinique spécifique.

author.name: Alan March
author.organisation: Hospital Universitario Austral, Buenos Aires, Argentina

author.name: Einar Fosse
author.organisation: Norwegian Centre for Integrated Care and Telemedicine, Tromsø, Norway

author.name: Vladimir Pizzo
author.organisation: Hospital Sírio Libanês, São Paulo, Brazil

nb.purpose: For å registrere et estimat av biologisk alder ved å vurdere graden av modning av skjelettet.
nb.use:
Brukes for å registrere et estimat av biologisk alder ved å vurdere graden av modning av skjelettet.

Skjelettalder kan fastlås gjennom flere ulike metoder. For eksempel: Røntgen av håndrot, nakkevirvler, pannebihuler eller ******

en.purpose: To record an estimate of biological age by assessing the degree of maturation of an individual's bones.
en.use:
Use to record an estimate of biological age by assessing the degree of maturation of an individual's bones.

The skeletal age can be determined by several different methods including but not limited to: Hand-wrist radiograph, Cervical vertebrae radiograph, Frontal sinus radiograph, Midpalatine suture.

at0005.1.description: An estimate of biological age by assessing the degree of maturation of an individual's bones.

at0006.1.description: Additional narrative not covered in other fields.

at0034.1.description: Standard deviation score (SDS) of bone age measurment.

at0021.1.description: The assessment method used to estimate the skeletal age.
at0021.1.comment: For example: Greulich & Pyle, Fishman method.

at0028.1.description: Narrative descripiton of any issues or factors that may impact on the assessment.

at0000.1.description:
An estimate of biological age by assessing the degree of maturation of an individual's bones.

Specialised for use with the RCPCH in the UK to include additional elements.

*An estimate of biological age by assessing the degree of maturation of an individual's bones.

Specialised for use with the RCPCH in the UK to include additional elements. (en)

author.name: John Tore Valand, Silje Ljosland Bakke
author.organisation: Helse Bergen HF, Norway, Helse Vest IKT AS

en.purpose: To record details about parameters plotted as percentiles on a growth chart.
en.use:
Use to record details about parameters plotted as percentiles on a growth chart.

Use the URI to explicitly link the original measurement as recorded.

Use in a template alongside OBSERVATION.age to record the adjusted age of an infant as part of monitoring child growth patterns.
en.misuse: Not to be used to record actual measurements. Use appropriate OBSERVATION archetypes for this purpose - for example OBSERVATION.height, OBSERVATION.weight, OBSERVATION.head_circumference, OBSERVATION.body_segment or OBSERVATION.blood_pressure.

at0000.1.description: Details about parameters plotted on a growth chart to allow monitoring of a child's growth over time, relative to a reference population.

at0011.1.description: The deviation of an individual's value from the median value for a reference population, divided by the standard deviation of the reference population.
at0011.1.comment: Also known as the Standard deviation score (SD).

at0010.1.description: Percentile calculated using standard normal distribution for the age (or adjusted age).

at0002.1.description: Default, unspecified point in time or interval event which may be explicitly defined in a template or at run-time.

at0002.2.description: Default, unspecified point in time or interval event which may be explicitly defined in a template or at run-time.

at0010.2.description: Percentile calculated using standard normal distribution for the age (or adjusted age).

at0011.2.description: The deviation of an individual's value from the median value for a reference population, divided by the standard deviation of the reference population.
at0011.2.comment: Also known as the Standard deviation score (SD).

at0019.1.description: A comment about the growth indicator, not captured in other fields.

at0019.2.description: A comment about the growth indicator, not captured in other fields.

at0042.description: Calculation reference for the growth indicator e.g. WHO, Down's Syndrome or Turner Syndrome.

de.purpose: Zur Darstellung der Altersparameter einer Person.
de.use:
Zur Darstellung der Altersparameter einer Person.

Diesen Archetypen zusammen mit dem OBSERVATION.child_growth Archetypen im Template verwenden, um das korrigierte Alter eines Säuglings im Rahmen der Überwachung des Kinderwachstums darzustellen.

en.purpose: To record parameters about the age of an individual.
en.use:
Use to record parameters about the age of an individual.

Use to in a template alongside OBSERVATION.child_growth to record the adjusted age of an infant as part of monitoring child growth patterns.

at0018.1.description: The postnatal gestation estimated by physical examination and/or neuromuscular assessment of newborn.
at0018.1.comment: Usually estimated by physical examination and/or neuromuscular assessment of the newborn.

at0027.description: Kategori som beskriver sammenhengen mellom et individs kjønnsidentitet med deres kjønn tildelt ved fødsel.

at0019.1.description: Kjønnet til et individ, bestemt på bakgrunn av anatomiske karakteristika og registrert ved fødsel.
at0019.1.comment: For eksempel: 'Mann', 'Kvinne', 'Intersex'. Koding med en terminologi er anbefalt, der det er mulig. Bruk elementet "Kommentar" eller SLOT'et "Ytterligere detaljer" dersom det er nødvendig å registrere mer spesifikke detaljer om individets kjønn.

at0020.1.description: Pronomenet som individet ønsker å identifiseres med og brukt når andre snakker om individet.

at0027.description: Category describing the alignment of an individual's gender identity with their sex assigned at birth.

at0020.1.description: The pronoun an individual chooses to identify with, and would prefer others to use when talking to or about that individual.

at0027.description: Kategorie, die die Übereinstimmung der Geschlechtsidentität einer Person mit ihrem bei der Geburt zugewiesenen Geschlecht beschreibt.

at0025.1.description: Der Ausdruck des Geschlechts durch das Individuum in Form von Verhalten, Sprache, Kleidung oder anderen äußeren Merkmalen.
at0025.1.comment: Zum Beispiel "männlich", "weiblich", "androgyn" oder "abwechselnd". Alternativ, eine Beschreibung.

at0019.1.description: Das Geschlecht einer Person, bestimmt durch anatomische Merkmale, welches bei der Geburt festgestellt und eingetragen wurden.
at0019.1.comment: Zum Beispiel: "Männlich", "Weiblich", "Intersexuell". Die Kodierung mit einer Terminologie wird empfohlen, wenn möglich. Falls notwendig, benutzen Sie das Element "Kommentar" oder den SLOT "Zusätzliche Details" um genauere Angaben zum Geschlecht der Person zu machen.

at0020.1.description: Das Pronomen, mit dem sich eine Person identifiziert, und welches die Person bevorzugen würde, wenn andere mit oder über diese Person sprechen.

at0022.1.description: Das Geschlecht einer Person, das für administrative Zwecke verwendet wird.
at0022.1.comment: Dieses Element beschreibt das, was die meisten Systeme heutzutage als "Geschlecht" (vgl. engl.: "Sex" oder "Gender") bezeichnen. Zum Beispiel "Männlich", "Weiblich", "Divers". Dieser Archetyp entspricht dem HL7 FHIR Element "Person.gender"'. Die Codierung mit einer Terminologie wird empfohlen, wenn möglich.

at0001.1.description: Die persönliche Wahrnehmung des eigenen Geschlechts.
at0001.1.comment: Zum Beispiel: "Frau", "Mann" oder "nicht-binär". Die Codierung mit einer Terminologie wird, wenn möglich, empfohlen.

at0027.description: *Category describing the alignment of an individual's gender identity with their sex assigned at birth. (en)

at0020.1.description: Det pronomen som individen väljer att identifiera sig med och föredrar att andra använder när de pratar med eller om personen i fråga.

at0027.description: *Category describing the alignment of an individual's gender identity with their sex assigned at birth.(en)

at0025.1.description: *The expression of the gender by the individual as demonstrated by behaviour, speech, clothes or other external characteristics.(en)

at0014.1.description: *Additional narrative about the individual's gender not captured in other data elements.(en)

at0004.1.description: *The date this gender data was last updated.(en)

at0026.1.description: *The gender of an individual used for official or legal purposes.(en)

at0019.1.description: *The sex of an individual determined by anatomical characteristics observed and registered at birth.(en)

at0020.1.description: *The pronoun an individual chooses to identify with, and would prefer others to use when talking to or about that individual.(en)

at0000.1.description: *Details about the gender of an individual.(en)

at0022.1.description: *The gender of an individual used for administrative purposes.(en)

at0001.1.description: *The individual's perception of their own gender.(en)
